UIStarredVersesWidget Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred. More...

#include <UIStarredVersesWidget.h>

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a list view which represents the verses the user has starred.
